attributes.action: The government to state that my EU citizenship cannot be removed involuntarily.
attributes.background: I believe that I am a European citizen and as such, hold a European and British passport. If indeed, I am a citizen of Europe, is it within the legal powers of the British government to remove my citizenship?

rejection.details:
We think you might want similar action to this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133603
